text: Nick Boynton (born January 14, 1979 in Nobleton, Ontario) is a Canadian retired professional ice hockey defenceman. He played a career total of 11 seasons in the National Hockey League (NHL). He played for the Boston Bruins, Phoenix Coyotes, Florida Panthers, Anaheim Ducks, Chicago Blackhawks, and the Philadelphia Flyers. He also played 9 regular seasons games with the Nottingham Panthers of the Elite Ice Hockey League (EIHL). Boynton was diagnosed with Type 1 Diabetes in 1997. He retired from playing professional ice hockey in 2011. ==Awards== *Stanley Cup \- with the Chicago Blackhawks (2010) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1974 births Category:Anaheim Ducks players Category:Boston Bruins players Category:Canadian ice hockey defencemen Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:Florida Panthers players Category:Living people Category:Manitoba Moose players Category:Philadelphia Flyers players Category:Phoenix Coyotes players Category:Providence Bruins players Category:Rockford IceHogs (AHL) players Category:Stanley Cup champions Category:Ontario Hockey League players Category:Memorial Cup winners
title: Nick Boynton
